movies.title: La fe
movies.plot: Father Luis Lastra is a young and pious priest who does his job in the village of Peñascosa. There he meets Marta, a beautiful parishioner very interested in religious matters. So much so that Marta convinces the priest to accompany her to enter the convent as a nun.
movies.simplePlot: Father Luis Lastra is a young and pious priest who does his job in the village of Peñascosa. There he meets Marta, a beautiful parishioner very interested in religious matters. So much so ...

biography.birthName: Virgen de los Desamparados Rivelles Ladrón de Guevara
biography.bio: Amparo Rivelles was born on February 11, 1925 in Madrid, Spain as Virgen de los Desamparados Rivelles Ladrón de Guevara. She was an actress, known for La fe (1947), La calle sin sol (1948) and The Nail (1944). She died on November 7, 2013 in Madrid, Madrid.
biography.name: Amparo Rivelles

biography.bio: Rafael Durán was born on December 15, 1911 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as Rafael Durán Espayaldo. He was an actor, known for The Prodigal Woman (1946), El destino se disculpa (1945) and La vida en un hilo (1945). He died on February 12, 1994 in Sevilla, Andalusia, Spain.
biography.name: Rafael Durán

biography.name: Guillermo Marín

biography.bio: Juan Espantaleón was born on March 12, 1885 in Seville, Spain as Juan Espantaleón Torres. He was an actor and writer, known for The Prodigal Woman (1946), The Nail (1944) and El fantasma y Dª Juanita (1945). He was married to María Victorero. He died on November 26, 1966 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Juan Espantaleón

biography.bio: Ricardo Calvo was born on April 19, 1875 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as Ricardo Calvo Agosti. He was an actor, known for I Was a Parish Priest (1953), La fe (1947) and Murió hace quince años (1954). He died on June 13, 1966 in Madrid.
biography.name: Ricardo Calvo

biography.bio: Fernando Fernández de Córdoba was born on November 28, 1897 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain. He was an actor and writer, known for Bambú (1945), Rumbo (1950) and La calle sin sol (1948). He died on February 28, 1982 in Madrid.
biography.name: Fernando Fernández de Córdoba

biography.bio: Camino Garrigó was born in Pamplona, Navarra, Spain. She was an actress, known for A Sight of Light (1943), El fantasma y Dª Juanita (1945) and La fe (1947). She died on January 2, 1954 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain.
biography.name: Camino Garrigó

biography.birthName: José María Prada de la Vega
biography.bio: José Prada was born on November 15, 1891 in Toledo, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain as José María Prada de la Vega. He was an actor, known for La vengeance (1958), Déracinés (1951) and Death of a Cyclist (1955). He died on August 19, 1983 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: José Prada

biography.bio: Joaquín Roa was born on August 15, 1895 in Pamplona, Navarra, Spain as Joaquín Fernández Roa. He was an actor, known for Viridiana (1961), Marcelin, pain et vin (1955) and Welcome Mr. Marshall! (1953). He died on May 23, 1981 in Pamplona.
biography.name: Joaquín Roa

biography.bio: Félix Fernández was born on July 21, 1899 in Cangas de Onís, Oviedo, Spain as Félix Fernández García. He was an actor, known for Welcome Mr. Marshall! (1953), The Rocket from Calabuch (1956) and ¿Crimen imposible? (1954). He was married to Irene Guerrero de Luna. He died on July 9, 1966 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Félix Fernández

biography.bio: Ángel de Andrés was born on May 25, 1918 in Madrid, Spain as Angel de Andrés Miquel. He was an actor and writer, known for Esquilache (1989), Historias de la radio (1955) and El hincha (1958). He was married to Conchita Juárez. He died on August 5, 2006 in Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Ángel de Andrés

biography.name: Carmen Sánchez

biography.bio: Irene Caba Alba was born on August 25, 1905 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. She was an actress, known for Bonjour la chance (1957), Las inquietudes de Shanti Andía (1947) and The Nail (1944). She was married to Emilio Gutiérrez. She died on January 14, 1957 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Irene Caba Alba

biography.bio: Juan Vázquez was born on March 8, 1900 in Madrid, Spain. He is an actor, known for Cuentos de la Alhambra (1950), Trifles (1950) and Historias de la radio (1955).
biography.name: Juan Vázquez

biography.bio: Arturo Marín was born on September 26, 1894 in Badajoz, Spain. He was an actor and writer, known for El crimen de Pepe Conde (1946), Comiques (1954) and I Was a Parish Priest (1953). He died on March 13, 1954 in Spain.
biography.name: Arturo Marín
